Call for Abstracts

Submission Guidelines

We invite researchers and practitioners to submit abstracts for consideration in the MPH 2026 program. Submissions should present original research or compelling case studies relevant to the conference tracks.

Topics of Interest

  • Epidemiology
  • Public Health Policy
  • Global Health Innovations
  • Clinical Interventions

Submission Process

  1. Prepare your abstract (max 300 words).
  2. Ensure you have speaker bios ready.
  3. Email your submission to abstracts@metaphorum2026.org with the subject line "Abstract Submission - [Your Name]".

Important Deadlines

  • Submission Opens: March 1, 2026
  • Submission Closes: June 15, 2026
  • Notification of Acceptance: July 15, 2026
